items.title: Trump envoy visits controversial Gaza aid distribution site
items.description: The visit with the IDF follows near daily reports of deadly shootings in the vicinity of the sites.

items.title: Zoo worker killed by tiger in Jerusalem
items.description: A worker has died after being attacked during a "behind-the-scenes tour" for visitors.

items.title: Zelensky demands tougher sanctions after Russian strikes kill 31 in Kyiv
items.description: It comes after the capital saw one of the most deadliest assaults since Russia's 2022 invasion.

items.title: Watch: 'UFO' spotted in Australian skies identified as Chinese rocket
items.description: Astrophysicists said that the unusual lights spotted over Brisbane were tied to a satellite launch from China.

items.title: Two girls shot in Gaza - BBC pieces together what happened and looks at dozens more child shootings
items.description: Layan and Mira were killed in proximity to IDF soldiers - the Israeli military says intentional harm to civilians is prohibited and their cases will b...
